img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with an enemy in a cave-like environment. The character is wielding a weapon and is surrounded by glowing effects. Nearby, there are several large pots, one of which is highlighted with a red dashed circle, possibly indicating an objective or item of interest. The game interface displays various icons and gauges, including a health bar at the bottom left and a "Will" counter set at 8 on the right side. The environment is rocky and dimly lit, contributing to the atmospheric setting of the scene.
